name: Steam Boat (Nawala)
description: Some of the food at Steamboat is good, but the delivery service and website are a bit of a shambles.
tip: If you do order delivery from Steamboat make sure the guy who takes your order reads it back to you if you want to get everything you asked for.
review:
Some of the food at Steamboat is good, but the delivery service and website are a bit of a shambles.

ස්ටීම් බෝට්හි සමහර කෑම හොඳයි. ඒත්, ඔවුන්ගේ වෙබ් අඩවිය හා ගෙදරට ගෙනැවිත් දෙන සේවාව‍ අන්තිමයි.
